content: 3 lots of Finite By Design coins for auction:LOT 1: 2016 Finite By Design "Ethereum Stage 2: Homestead" 3 coin set #42, alloyLOT 2: 2016 Finite By Design "We Are All Satoshi" 3 coin set #42, alloyLOT 3: 2014 Finite By Design Dogecoin coin #42, copper**All coins come with holograms and Lot 1 also comes with COAs**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 22nd, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsLN, ETH, LTC, and DOGE also accepted due to BTC network congestion/fees being ridiculous!!SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
